title: Elekta Executive Boardroom CMS
summary: Boardroom app updates: more control, tablet support.
oneLiner: Updates to an executive boardroom app: per‑platform customization, custom context menus, and Surface tablet support.
problem: Elekta needed fine‑grained control of presentations across platforms, plus a way to expose quick actions via context menus and run the experience on Surface 3 tablets.
scope: Designed the database schema for custom context actions
Linked new buttons to existing content types
Built a Vue 2 drag‑and‑drop editor for managing menus
Helped adapt the experience for Surface tablets
decisions: Modeled context actions as first‑class entities with clean relations
Built a reusable menu editor instead of ad‑hoc forms
Kept platform‑specific logic isolated so behavior stayed predictable
outcome: A more customizable app that let sales and executives tailor the experience quickly and take it on the road.
notes: My first time using Vue—happy with how the editor felt. Next time I’d add a tiny test suite around the menu logic.
